title: Glenn Dobbs Interviews Matthew Socey

author: viewerswfyi@wfyi.org (WFYI Public Media)

description: This week's Film Soceyology turns into Stage Soceyology as the tables are turned. Indy Bard Fest founder Glenn Dobbs interviews Matthew Socey, who is the director of a radio version of Plaza Suite, which opens this weekend at The Cat Theatre in Carmel. Also, grab a pencil...
